wikitext.*:
<noinclude>仅供{{tl|user}}</noinclude><includeonly><!--{if !isset($wgUser) || !$wgUser}--><!--{assign var="wgUser" value=true scope="global"}--><style>
.mw-body-content {
    z-index: 1;
}

.userlink {
    font-size: inherit !important;
    position: relative;
}

.userlink .userlink-brackets,
.userlink .userlink-comma {
    display: none;
}

.userlink .userlink-label {
    padding: 0 .625em;
    cursor: pointer;
    display: inline !important;
    font-size: smaller;
}

.userlink .userlink-label:before {
    content: '[';
}

.userlink .userlink-label:after {
    content: ']';
}

.userlink:hover .userlink-label:after {
    transform: scaleY(-1);
}

.userlink .userlink-menu {
    display: none;
    position: absolute;
    top: 1.25em;
    left: 0;
    width: max-content;
    z-index: 2;
    background-color: #fff;
    border: 1px solid #a2a9b1;
    border-top-width: 0;
    box-shadow: 0 1px 1px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, .1);
}

.userlink:hover .userlink-menu,
.userlink:active .userlink-menu {
    display: block;
}

.userlink .userlink-item {
    display: block;
}

.userlink .userlink-item a {
    display: block;
    white-space: nowrap;
    color: #0645ad;
    cursor: pointer;
    font-size: .8em;
    padding: .3125em .625em;
    transition: all .37s ease-in-out;
}

.userlink .userlink-item a.external {
    padding-right: calc(.625em + 13px);
    background-position-x: 6.125em;
}

.userlink .userlink-item a:hover {
    background-color: rgb(241, 247, 255);
}
</style><!--{/if}--></includeonly>
